synopsis: In episode #12 of PBR, hosts Devam and Ahir welcome Valente, a talented music producer and teacher, who shares his heartfelt journey through life's challenges, including childhood cancer and the importance of creativity. The conversation delves into the beauty of existence, the struggles of control, and the transformative power of music, making for an inspiring and uplifting episode.
quotes: If you want to make the world a better place, take a look at yourself and make a change.
Life needs to happen for a while in order for me to have something to express.
I think it's really brave to decide to leave your job and throw yourself into the unknown.
You can really change the world in small ways, I believe.
It takes a village to raise a child.
I always felt very safe and taken care of by all older people around me.
Sometimes you just have to exist and chill without any tasks to do.
Everything is always changing; it can be dangerous to feel like you have to do something all the time.
It's okay to not have control over everything; sometimes you just have to let things be.
You could just lay out on your balcony and just exist; this is the perfect music to exist to.
